title: Holiday Curlfriends Mixer
desc:
The cold weather is here and that means that the fun NYC natural hair events are coming to an end for the year.? @NaturalPartnersinCrime  and  @BeauTIFFulCurls  have teamed up for one last mixer to close out the year! The Back to School  #B2SMixer  was a hit! You guys have been asking for another one ever since so on?Wednesday December 2nd?we're doing it again! 
 This time we're taking over Lulu's Taqueria and Tequila Bar, one of Harlem's gems. Known for their authentic Mexican food, amazing cocktails, and quality ingredients, Lulu's instantly became a hit in the neighborhood! 
 
 Passed appetizers include a taco bar buffet as well as chips, pico de gallo, and guacamole. 
   We?ll be discussing our winter beauty regimens and sharing our top products for the colder months in the ?Winter Survival Kit? swag bag! 
 You know how we do... $20 gets you passed appetizers, happy hour drink specials, & a swole swagbag! 
 
 FAQs ? 
 Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event? 
 This event is for adults only, 21+ 
 What are my transport/parking options getting to the event? 
 Street Parking is available but the venue is a walking distance from the 2, 3, A, B, C, & D trains. The A, B, C, D line is just 2 blocks away! 
 Is my registration/ticket transferrable? 
 Yes 
 Are tickets refundable? 
 No
